contactPage.intro: Feel free to contact Merri Hakobyan through any of the following channels. Choose the method that's most convenient for you.

contactPage.whatsappDescription: Chat on WhatsApp for instant messaging

news.title: NEWS
news.subtitle: Stay connected with the latest from Merri Hakobyan
news.heading: Latest News
news.description: Get the latest updates on performances, releases, and events featuring Merri Hakobyan. Stay connected with news from the world of Armenian music and television.
news.interviewsDescription: Watch exclusive interviews and press coverage featuring Merri Hakobyan. Get insights into her career, music, and personal journey through various media appearances.

bio.title: BIO
bio.subtitle: About Merri Hakobyan
bio.description: Merri Hakobyan is a celebrated Armenian singer known for her exceptional talent and contribution to Armenian music and culture. With a deep passion for music, she continues to inspire audiences worldwide.

videos.title: VIDEO CLIPS
videos.subtitle: Music Videos
videos.description: Watch the latest music videos and performances

songs.description: Explore and download the musical works of Merri Hakobyan
songs.noSongs: No songs found. Add .mp3 files to the public/music folder.

tvSerials.title: TV SERIALS

tvSerials.heading: Featured TV Serials
tvSerials.description: Discover our collection of television serials featuring compelling narratives, dynamic characters, and powerful storytelling. Watch episodes from Meri Hakobyan's television career.

award.title: AWARDS
award.subtitle: Recognition & Achievements
award.description: Celebrating the accolades and honors received throughout an illustrious career in music and entertainment
award.heading: Awards & Recognition
award.intro: Throughout her distinguished career, Merri Hakobyan has been honored with numerous awards and recognitions for her exceptional contributions to Armenian music and culture. These accolades reflect her dedication, talent, and impact on the entertainment industry.

award1.title: Best Female Artist
award1.description: Recognized for outstanding vocal performance and artistic excellence

award2.title: Cultural Contribution Award
award2.description: Honored for preserving and promoting Armenian musical heritage

award3.title: Television Excellence Award
award3.description: Acknowledged for exceptional contributions to television programming

timeline1.text: Received the prestigious Best Female Artist award, recognizing years of dedication to Armenian music and exceptional vocal talent that has touched countless hearts.

timeline2.text: Honored with the Cultural Contribution Award for outstanding efforts in preserving Armenian musical traditions and bringing them to new generations.

timeline3.text: Awarded the Television Excellence Award for significant contributions to Armenian television programming and cultural representation.

teatre.title: THEATER
teatre.subtitle: Stage Performances & Drama
teatre.description: Exploring theatrical performances and dramatic works that showcase artistic versatility and stage presence
teatre.heading: Theater & Stage Performances
teatre.intro: Merri Hakobyan has graced the theater stage with captivating performances, bringing Armenian stories and dramatic works to life. Her theatrical journey showcases a unique blend of musical talent and dramatic expression, creating memorable experiences for audiences.

performance1.title: Musical Theater Production
performance1.description: Leading role in a celebrated Armenian musical theater production

performance2.title: Dramatic Performance
performance2.description: Showcasing exceptional dramatic range and emotional depth

performance3.title: Cultural Theater Piece
performance3.description: Participating in productions that celebrate Armenian cultural heritage

performance4.title: How to Get Rid of a Wife
performance4.description: A comedy play featuring Meri Hakobyan in an engaging theatrical performance
performance4.cast: Ben Avetisyan, Meri Hakobyan, Davit Tadevosyan, Vanush Shahinyan
performance4.author: Aldo Nicolai

performance5.title: 40 Days Before Ascension
performance5.description: A tragicomedy performance featuring Meri Hakobyan in a compelling dramatic work
performance5.cast: Gnel Ulikhanyan, Meri Hakobyan, Grigori Hakobyan, Yuri Igitkhanyan, Armen Margaryan, Shogher Jalalyan
performance5.author: Samvel Khalatyan
performance5.venue: AGBU Vatche & Tamar Manoukian Performing Arts Center

performance6.title: Interview
performance6.description: Performed more than 15 times, each show was sold out

performance7.title: How to Get Rid of a Woman
performance7.description: Rooftop comedy production at Hollywood Production. Role: Lead Actress.

performance8.title: The Idiot
performance8.description: Classic dramatic adaptation of Dostoevsky's masterpiece
performance8.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

performance9.title: Mother's Field
performance9.description: Powerful dramatic work by Chinghiz Aitmatov
performance9.author: Chinghiz Aitmatov

timeline1.text: Starred in a major musical theater production, combining exceptional vocal talent with dramatic performance, receiving critical acclaim from audiences and critics alike.

timeline2.text: Delivered powerful dramatic performances that showcased versatility beyond music, demonstrating the ability to connect with audiences through theatrical storytelling.

timeline3.text: Participated in cultural theater productions that brought Armenian stories and traditions to the stage, contributing to the preservation of cultural heritage through dramatic arts.
